channel.title: Security, Product, Quality on Secure Delivery
channel.description: Recent content in Security, Product, Quality on Secure Delivery

item.title: Securing the Digital Factory: Part 1
item.description: I’m not sure what’s the best hero image for an article talking about “digital factories”, maybe it’s a “Minority Report but in a hardhat” kind of vibe? Let’s go with that. To business! If you know me you know I’m not a big fan of analogies. They’re generally used to poorly convey a reasonably complex topic in an overly-simplistic way, by people who have a poor understanding of the subject matter to start with.
